scenario_text.value:
I’ve learned a great deal since last I saw
this mural, and so have made new discoveries.

First of all, the four god-like beings at the
top are the Four Sovereign Monsters.

Oh yeah, you’re right! They look just like
they did when we saw them.

Also, note how the monsters and the humans
have been separated into their own areas.

And crucially, I believe these areas are
meant to indicate a hierarchical arrangement.

See how the humans in the lowest area are
fighting, while at the top it’s peaceful?

The Four Sovereign Monsters we met, likely
brought order to the world of the monsters.

In other words, the division is between
a world with gods and a world that’s godless?

That may be going too far, but the Sovereign
Monsters’ presence likely did bring order.
So they really are something special.

If their mere presence brings order...perhaps
the Four Sovereign Monsters are indeed gods.
